00002 * $Id$          dac_dma.c                               2010-05-21

00026 #include "lpc17xx_dac.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00029 #include "lpc17xx_gpdma.h"
00030 
00031 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00037 /************************** PRIVATE MACROS *************************/
00039 #define DMA_SIZE                1
00040 
00041 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00042 // Terminal Counter flag for Channel 0
00043 __IO uint32_t Channel0_TC;
00044 
00045 // Error Counter flag for Channel 0
00046 __IO uint32_t Channel0_Err;
00047 
00048 GPDMA_Channel_CFG_Type GPDMACfg;
00049 
00050 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTION *************************/
00051 void DMA_IRQHandler (void);
00052 
00053 
00054 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00055 /*********************************************************************/
00060 void DMA_IRQHandler (void)
00061 {
00062         // check GPDMA interrupt on channel 0
00063         if (GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INT, 0)){
00064                 // Check counter terminal status
00065                 if(GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INTTC, 0)){
00066                         GPDMA_ClearIntPending (GPDMA_STATCLR_INTTC, 0);
00067                         Channel0_TC++;
00068                 }
00069                 // Check error terminal status
00070                 if (GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INTERR, 0)){
00071                         GPDMA_ClearIntPending (GPDMA_STATCLR_INTERR, 0);
00072                         Channel0_Err++;
00073                 }
00074         }
00075 }
00076 
00077 
00078 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00079 /*********************************************************************/
00084 int c_entry(void)
00085 {
00086         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00087         DAC_CONVERTER_CFG_Type DAC_ConverterConfigStruct;
00088         uint32_t dac_value =0;
00089         uint32_t i;
00090         /*
00091          * Init DAC pin connect
00092          * AOUT on P0.26
00093          */
00094         PinCfg.Funcnum = 2;
00095         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00096         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00097         PinCfg.Pinnum = 26;
00098         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00099         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00100 
00101         /* GPDMA block section -------------------------------------------- */
00102 
00103         /* Disable GPDMA interrupt */
00104         NVIC_DisableIRQ(DMA_IRQn);
00105 
00106         /* preemption = 1, sub-priority = 1 */
00107         NVIC_SetPriority(DMA_IRQn, ((0x01<<3)|0x01));
00108 
00109         DAC_ConverterConfigStruct.CNT_ENA =SET;
00110         DAC_ConverterConfigStruct.DMA_ENA = SET;
00111         DAC_Init(LPC_DAC);
00112         /* set time out for DAC*/
00113         DAC_SetDMATimeOut(LPC_DAC,0xFFFF);
00114         DAC_ConfigDAConverterControl(LPC_DAC, &DAC_ConverterConfigStruct);
00115 
00116         /* Initialize GPDMA controller */
00117         GPDMA_Init();
00118 
00119         // Setup GPDMA channel --------------------------------
00120         // channel 0
00121         GPDMACfg.ChannelNum = 0;
00122         // Source memory
00123         GPDMACfg.SrcMemAddr = (uint32_t)(&dac_value);
00124         // Destination memory - unused
00125         GPDMACfg.DstMemAddr = 0;
00126         // Transfer size
00127         GPDMACfg.TransferSize = DMA_SIZE;
00128         // Transfer width - unused
00129         GPDMACfg.TransferWidth = 0;
00130         // Transfer type
00131         GPDMACfg.TransferType = GPDMA_TRANSFERTYPE_M2P;
00132         // Source connection - unused
00133         GPDMACfg.SrcConn = 0;
00134         // Destination connection
00135         GPDMACfg.DstConn = GPDMA_CONN_DAC;
00136         // Linker List Item - unused
00137         GPDMACfg.DMALLI = 0;
00138         // Setup channel with given parameter
00139         GPDMA_Setup(&GPDMACfg);
00140 
00141         /* Reset terminal counter */
00142         Channel0_TC = 0;
00143         /* Reset Error counter */
00144         Channel0_Err = 0;
00145 
00146         /* Enable GPDMA interrupt */
00147         NVIC_EnableIRQ(DMA_IRQn);
00148 
00149         /* Wait for GPDMA processing complete */
00150         while (1) {
00151 
00152                 // Enable GPDMA channel 0
00153                 GPDMA_ChannelCmd(0, ENABLE);
00154 
00155                 while ((Channel0_TC == 0) );
00156 
00157                 // Disable GPDMA channel 0
00158                 GPDMA_ChannelCmd(0, DISABLE);
00159 
00160                 dac_value ++;
00161                 if (dac_value == 0x3FF) dac_value =0;
00162                 //delay
00163                 for(i=0;i<100000;i++);
00164 
00165                 /* Reset terminal counter */
00166                 Channel0_TC = 0;
00167 
00168                 // Re-setup channel
00169                 GPDMA_Setup(&GPDMACfg);
00170         }
00171 
00172         return 1;
00173 }
00174 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00175    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00176    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00177    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00178    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00179 int main(void)
00180 {
00181     return c_entry();
00182 }

00189 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00190 * @return               None
00191 *******************************************************************************/

00193 {
00194         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00195          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00196

00198         while(1);
00199 }
